definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Colleen was a loner, except for her sister’s company.
sentences.chinese: 除了和妹妹做伴之外，科琳是個獨行俠。

sentences.english: Two new character posters for The Lone Ranger have been released.
sentences.chinese: 日前《獨行俠》曝光了兩張最新的角色海報。

sentences.english: Lone hero crusading for the truth against a corrupt Establishment?
sentences.chinese: 獨行俠式的英雄，爲真理出徵，挑戰腐敗的體制？
野山貓通常都是獨行俠。

definition: the second person/(fig.) someone else/third party
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
lit. reincarnated in sb else's body (idiom); fig. a discarded or discredited idea returns in another guise
